runs.comm: nudged behind square leg to get the scoreboard moving. Shortish from Cusack, and refusing to give the batsman any room
just back of a length on off stump, Barresi can only block into the covers. Good start so far from Ireland
nails the leg-stump yorker as he sees the batsman making room for himself. Excellent bowling, beats him
goes for the slower, offcutting bouncer. But it drifts down leg. Easy decision for the ump once Barresi ducks under it
good length ball outside off, mistimed to mid-on. Maybe went for it too early

walks right across his stumps to try and flick. Its a full toss that clips his pads, right in front of middle stump! Thats desperately close. But the umpire shakes his head. Vineet Kulkarni thinks it would slide down with the angle
straying down leg, whipped away to the long leg boundary. Too easy for Barresi
pushes him back with a shortish delivery on and around off stump, Myburgh is nearly off balanced as he knocks it off the back foot to point

dragged on! Extra pace, extra bounce on Youngs side. The batsman was looking to cut, but the ball didnt give him any room. Myburgh hit 63 off 23 balls that night in Sylhet. Now he has to walk back for 1 off 3
just back of a length and outside off, shoulders arms
looks to slash over point, but Young extracts enough bounce to beat him. Lovely delivery angling across the left-hander
hes a pretty tall lad, Cooper. Lunges forward to a length ball and lifts it over mid-off. Good, solid shot.
thats the length for the bowlers on this pitch. Just short of good, and the new ball does nibble. Cooper is left with nothing as he pokes outside off
continues making room outside leg, Cusack continues to push a back of a length delivery into the batsmans body. Strikes it as well
switches it up and moves outside off this time. Cusack tries a cross-seamed, short delivery outside off. Barresi is well-balanced as he flat bats a boundary over mid-off
guides a shortish delivery outside off to deep third man
good length ball on middle, Cooper wades forward and nudges it to midwicket

drops a dolly at short fine leg. Cusack even began celebrating, but then grimaces. Not a pretty image. Not a pretty error. This was a slower short ball which put the batsman off. Barresi has to wait on his pull, didnt wait long enough. Lobs a simple chance to the fielder who comes forward, has ages to get behind the ball, which pops in and pops out
no matter, hes gone now! Cusack, has his man. Back of a good length on and around off stump. Barresi goes full throttle. The on-the-up drive is miscued to mid-off

ooh, this is a lovely spell of cricket from Ireland. Gets the outside edge, but it goes wide of the lone slip. Lovely delivery, just nibbling away on middle stump. Cooper is caught on the crease as he defends and gets away with it

what is going on! Had this been a direct hit, he would have been miles out! Cooper dabs it into the covers and looks for an escape, which is not there. Swart has given up while he was running, but the lack of a direct hit saves him
fuller delivery outside off, drilled into the coveres and the short cover fielder pulls off a stunning, one-handed save
short cover again, to the left-hander. Fuller delivery outside off, hit smartly but not into the gap
back of a length and outside off, sliced behind point
backs away and slashes at a good length ball and sends it flying over the covers. Netherlands needed that, just to calm their nerves and tell themselves they are still ahead of this game
walks across to take a length ball from outside off and thumps it over midwicket. That length doesnt seem to be working in Malahide today. Though not sure Cusack has the pace to dig it in short
back of a length and outside off, dabbed to short third man for a proper, quick single
shortish on off stump, stays in line with it and blocks
waits on the short delivery outside off and carves it behind point. Strong shot, and he was making sure he placed it right
whipped off his knees to the right of deep backward square leg
just back of a good length on middle, tucked past midwicket to retain strike
slow yorker on middle and leg, flicked through square leg
right up there on middle, pushed to long-off
invites him on the front foot and Swart drills it to mid-on
back of a length on middle and leg, clipped to the left of short fine leg
looks for a wild swing over the leg side and is hit on the pads. Wicketkeeper goes up in appeal, but this had pitched way down leg
thinks he has a lot more room than there was. The slice behind point goes off the inside edge back to the bowler
tossed up on middle and leg, Swart misses a flick
comes down the track, but Dockrell has adjusted his length and allows the batsman to only defend
goes for the reverse sweep then, but he cant get the fuller ball on off stump past short third man
flatter delivery sliding down, swept away to deep square leg
short and wide outside off, cut away to deep point
short on middle, pulled to deep midwicket
low full toss just outside off, swung away to deep midwicket
goes for a flick, but he is cramped to connect with the shot. Struck on the pads, but it had pitched outside leg. Frustrating lines from Mooney
good length ball just outside off, tapped into the covers
outside edge, but it flies fine. Mooney just chews his gum and doesnt look amused. It was the slower ball on off stump, Cooper goes for the slash and beats short third man on his right
in the slot for the thump down the ground and he does so. Mooney tries to leap to his left and conjure a catch, but the ball had gone past him by then
good length just outside off, sliced to point
stands tall behind a back of a length delivery outside off and punches to short cover
launched over deep midwicket! Gets down to a length ball and slog sweeps it away into the grass banks
ooh, spin and bounce! Hits a good length just outside off, it pitches and grips and leaps up at the batsman who has to soften his hands on a dab into the off side
this is the quicker ball, Cooper spotted it and uses the pace. Pull to long leg finds the boundary
good length ball on off stump, gets forward to block
short and wide outside off, cracked away to deep cover
good length on off stump, pushed down the ground towards long-off
fuller delivery tailing in on leg stump, but Swart keeps back and slices it behind point
full on middle and leg, Cooper swipes to the left of long-on
picked it up and smashed the ball to the midwicket boundary. A #SwartSwat, if you will. Length, at that pace, will be dismissed
back of a length and just outside off, run down to short third man who misfields. Its the captain himself there
shortish and outside off, Cooper slaps it through point. There is protection in the deep
goes for a cut and is beaten because of the extra bounce on a shortish delivery outside off
another short ball slid across the left-hander, and no matter how tall Cooper is, he cant get up quickly enough for the cut behind point
gets behind a back of a length delivery on off stump and uses a straighter bat to make better connection. Guided to point
smeared through the covers. Pure power from Cooper. Cleared that front leg, drives on the up and picks the gap to the right of short cover
shortish and outside off, run down to deep third man
back of a length on off stump, dabbed behind the stumps for a quick single
picks out long-on! it was a length ball, it deserved a #SwartSwat. But he has mistimed it. Goes only as far as Poynter
good length ball cuts back in to the batsman. Borren defends and the ball bounces over the stumps and into the keepers gloves
waits on the short delivery and works it behind square leg
shortish and outside off, pushed into the covers
full and tailing on leg stump as KOB goes around the stumps. Nudged to midwicket
finds another yorker on middle, pushed into the covers
shortish and outside off, run down to backward point
ramped it all the way! Saw the ball short, swayed inside the line and just helped the ball away over the keepers head. Beautiful shot

extra bounce! Young reminds the Netherlands captain how ungainly he had looked. Back of a length delivery kicks up at Borren, who was looking to flick the ball. Takes the shoulder of the bat and loops away to third man
back of a length and outside off, run down to deep third man
good length just outside off, defended
clears that front leg and looks to tonk it over extra cover. Missed by a mile
made his own room to cut a back of a length ball off the stumps and past point. Dockrell in the deep makes a good chase to his right and keeps it to one
lots of tail in and Borren just about keeps out a yorker down the leg side
plants that front leg in front of middle and flicks around it. Had he missed that, the fuller ball could have trapped him
full toss has worked! He was looking for a yorker, but once he missed his spot Cooper would have been looking at a six. Slashes it over point, but he cant clear the fielder at deep point
full on middle and leg, nudged to long-on

full and curling in, picked away down to long-on and they go for a very risky second run! Very risky one could have turned horrid for Netherlands had Poynters throw been closer to the stumps. Thompson collects it and then tries to break the stumps, but he cant reach it
goes into the reverse sweep too early and Dockrell manage to loop the ball down leg to cramp him
flatter delivery pushed through down leg, Borren was looking to lap sweep it over short fine leg. Cant connect
tossed up on middle, nudged to the left of short fine leg
drags it short and its been whip-pulled away to deep square leg
goes back to a good length ball on middle and whips it through midwicket
keeps him quiet with a flatter delivery outside off, because Borren stayed a bit too leg side of the ball and doesnt get any timing on his slash
punches it down the ground to retain strike, another flatter ball
goes wide of the crease for a low full toss on off stump, driven to long-on
full on middle, clipped away to deep square leg
big appeal from the keeper, nothing from the bowler because Mooney started this slower ball well wide of the crease and angled it down leg. Batsman misses the flick and is even struck outside leg
an almost yorker on middle, pushed down to long-on
slower short ball outside off, Borren waits on it and pulls it right between square leg and long leg on the boundary. Excellent shot
inside edge as he looks to slug a length ball from outside off through midwicket. Ends up with a single to long leg instead
goes back and picks a length ball on middle through square leg
away she goes! Solid strike from O Dowd. Gets down the pitch and smacked over long-on, where it appears George Dockrells father is at. Wouldnt like his son being whacked like that
pushed through down leg, the batsman lets it go but the ball might just have clipped a bit of pad while going down to short fine leg
fired in flat on middle, clipped through square leg
top edge goes right over the keeper and trickles away to the boundary. Couldnt reach the ball as he indulges in his favourite sweep shot. Gets away with it
another mistimed lap sweep,  but this one had enough to become a one-bounce four to long leg, Dockrell goes flat and full, Borren uses that to his advantage
slow, short ball with loads of room. O Dowd smashes it away to the midwicket boundary. Netherlands are marching into this final here
taken at deep midwicket, Malahide roars. Its a length ball on off stump, flicked away strongly but doenst place it well. The Irish players on the park dont seem too enthused by it though.
looks for the yorker on middle, Borren just about keeps it out
flayed through the covers! Width on offer and he gets down on one knee to get it past Mooney at cover
full and down leg, worked away to the left of long leg.
low full toss on middle, clipped to deep square leg

and the captain takes his team into the final. Mooney looks to go full and into the blockhole, Borren gets outside the line of the ball and glances it quite fine to the long leg boundary. Very composed innings, and that will mean Netherlands will play Scotland for the WT20 Qualifier trophy
